name: Welcome Email
subject: Welcome to Our CRM Solution
body:
Hi {{contact_name}},

Welcome to our CRM platform! We're excited to help you streamline your sales processes and grow your business.

Your account is now set up and ready to use. Here are some quick next steps:
- Complete your profile setup
- Import your existing contacts
- Schedule a demo with our team

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
The CRM Team

name: Follow-up After Demo
subject: Thank you for the demo - Next steps
body:
Hi {{contact_name}},

Thank you for taking the time to see our platform demo yesterday. I hope you found it valuable and can see how our solution could benefit {{company_name}}.

As discussed, here are the next steps:
- Technical requirements review
- Pricing proposal preparation
- Implementation timeline planning

I'll send over the detailed proposal by {{follow_up_date}}. In the meantime, please let me know if you have any questions.

Looking forward to moving forward together!

Best regards,
{{sales_rep_name}}

name: Proposal Follow-up
subject: Following up on our proposal
body:
Hi {{contact_name}},

I wanted to follow up on the proposal I sent last week for {{company_name}}'s CRM implementation.

Have you had a chance to review it? I'd be happy to schedule a call to discuss any questions or concerns you might have.

The proposal includes:
- Complete system setup and configuration
- Data migration from your current system
- Team training and onboarding
- 6 months of premium support

Please let me know when would be a good time to connect.

Best regards,
{{sales_rep_name}}

name: Contract Renewal
subject: Time to renew your CRM subscription
body:
Hi {{contact_name}},

Your CRM subscription is set to expire on {{expiration_date}}. We'd love to continue supporting {{company_name}}'s growth!

This year, you've:
- Managed {{contact_count}} contacts
- Closed {{deals_closed}} deals worth ${{total_revenue}}
- Improved your sales efficiency by {{efficiency_improvement}}%

To ensure uninterrupted service, please renew by {{renewal_deadline}}. We've prepared a special renewal offer with enhanced features.

Let's schedule a quick call to discuss your renewal options.

Best regards,
{{account_manager_name}}

name: Cold Outreach - Technology
subject: Streamline your sales process with AI-powered CRM
body:
Hi {{contact_name}},

I noticed that {{company_name}} is growing rapidly in the {{industry}} space. Congratulations on your recent success!

Many companies like yours struggle with managing leads and tracking sales activities as they scale. Our AI-powered CRM has helped similar companies:
- Increase sales productivity by 40%
- Improve lead conversion rates by 25%
- Reduce administrative time by 60%

Would you be interested in a 15-minute call to see how we could help {{company_name}} streamline your sales processes?

Best regards,
{{sales_rep_name}}

name: Cold Outreach - Healthcare
subject: HIPAA-compliant CRM for healthcare organizations
body:
Hi {{contact_name}},

Healthcare organizations like {{company_name}} need specialized CRM solutions that understand the unique challenges of your industry.

Our HIPAA-compliant CRM platform is designed specifically for healthcare providers and includes:
- Secure patient data management
- Compliance reporting and audit trails
- Integration with EMR systems
- Automated appointment scheduling

We've helped over 200 healthcare organizations improve their patient engagement and operational efficiency.

Would you be open to a brief conversation about how we could support {{company_name}}'s growth?

Best regards,
{{sales_rep_name}}

name: Meeting Reminder
subject: Reminder: Our meeting tomorrow

name: Thank You After Purchase
subject: Welcome to the family!
body:
Hi {{contact_name}},

Welcome to the CRM family! We're thrilled that {{company_name}} has chosen our platform to power your sales operations.

Your implementation team will be in touch within 24 hours to begin the onboarding process. Here's what to expect:
- Initial setup and configuration call
- Data migration planning
- Team training sessions
- Go-live support

Your dedicated customer success manager is {{csm_name}} ({{csm_email}}). They'll be your primary point of contact throughout the implementation and beyond.

Thank you for choosing us. We're committed to your success!

Best regards,
{{sales_rep_name}}
